title: I feel like the new game mode...
body: Is basically the same game but with limited champions. Everyone still kills everyone in .5 seconds...

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Attticus Finch,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AK9GAbN7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-10T02:56:40.825+0000)
>
> What's your point?

Assassin's rule normal SR...

> Everything functions as an assassin in normal SR...

FTFY

If this is their "assassin power fantasy", then it's my design nightmare. 

The game is all the more boring, when fights are about nothing more than who engages and reaction time.

> [{quoted}](name=deadlychuck,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AK9GAbN7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-10T06:37:40.005+0000)
>
> If this is their "assassin power fantasy", then it's my design nightmare. 
> 
> The game is all the more boring, when fights are about nothing more than who engages and reaction time.

Funny thing is I get S rank on kassadin pretty much every game... not sure If I have that good of reaction time, kassadin is op... or what... but I main morde so I doubt I'm that great with kassadin...

That's how the game has been the past season and a half anyway. 

Like OP said, same gameplay, limited pool.
